website_summaries.verdict: In terms of affordable style and functionality, this bench offers unbeatable value for money.
pros: Faux leather exterior with double stitched lines and a tufted lid offers modern appeal
Collapsible design makes set up a breeze
This bench gets high marks for its affordability
cons: Some owners report an unpleasant odor that dissipates over time
Lid needs to be removed when opening

customer_reviews.title: Storage ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful, i purchased two for my dining room to add the look of a built in seating area. Very satisfied with product and to have extra storage when i need is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these! Love them they are a good value and work great. I store all kinds of things in them in my entry hall and living room. They look nice and are sturdy enough to sit on and put shoes on. One is pictured in the after picture of the front hallway we were rearranging.
customer_reviews.author: Keri B. Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this ottoman! Looks great in my foyer under my entry table. Already ordered another one for my Loft!
customer_reviews.author: Ms LisaLisa

customer_reviews.title: perfect bench
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my dining room to store daughters toys and it made my dining room so neat and look like a dining room again
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Perez

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something at the foot of my bed that my elderly cat could use as a step; I have seen similar benches at Home Goods for $129 but I really didn't like them. I did not expect to find a functional bench, that looks this good (not cheap at all) and has a modern flair. During the evening I store the decorative pillows from my bed in the bench. Assembly is hardly required, all you have to do is erect the collapsed box and put the cover on it. This was one of my smartest/favorite Amazon purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Great storage chest/ ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, big enough, love the color. I have a queen size bed and use it as a storage chest. Good for extra storage and looks great. Easy assembly. I recommend buying from this vendor. It arrived quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ttate2015

customer_reviews.title: Going to the garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Crap! It cover of the storage broke the first time my 11-yeara-old sat in it! Going to the garbage! I am so upset!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Baldo

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It took 2 seconds to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It took 2 seconds to put together and looks fantastic. I wanted something that I could store my son's toys in and that he could practice pulling himself up to stand with that didn't have sharp corners, and this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Britten Rollo

customer_reviews.title: like once a week for a moment
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth trying to decide if I would keep this or not and finally since I would have had to pay more in return shipping that I spent had to keep it. I was worried it would not hold up with kids and all and it has not. We use it for a toy chest and occasionally sit on it, like once a week for a moment. The lid has split at the corners meaning if you sit on it at all it sinks in and now your sprawling. Its uncomfortable and I don't like it much at all. Maybe it would hold up better if you never really used it.
customer_reviews.author: Mya Burgoon

customer_reviews.title: ... of these 2 years ago and they're still in excellent condition. In fact they still look brand new
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these 2 years ago and they're still in excellent condition. In fact they still look brand new, like the day i got them. I use one as a coffee table and I'm using one in my bedroom for storage at the foot of my bed. They look great and have plenty of room inside for storage. Very sturdy too. I sit on it when I'm playing guitar and it's very strong and sturdy. I'm moving to a bigger place and am thinking of buying another one and thought I'd check back here to see if they're still being sold. I'm so glad they are still on Amazon! I'm definitely getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: VRMJ

customer_reviews.title: Both of mine completely collapsed after only a few uses ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of mine completely collapsed after only a few uses. It's in essence cardboard shoved inside faux leather. It cannot hold any weight, it cannot be moved with weight in it, and you certainly can't really even sit on it. I'm nervous even putting my feet up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Demeter

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: This is a joke. It folds together like one of the cheap bins that go in those square cubby furniture shelves. It stinks. I have had it airing out for a month, I have put it outside and kept it inside. I have used all sorts of sprays. The smell will not go away. I cannot store my blankets I. It as planned. While it is sturdy enough to use as an ottoman, it is not sturdy enough for seating. I am ashamed I. Myself for wasting my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny MTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Strong Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and both have a very strong chemical smell. The item even comes with a note in the packaging that I need to air it out for 2-3 days before using. They have been sitting in the a corner of the bedroom for less than an hour and the whole room smells strongly of chemicals as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great products, not that sturdy 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! I put all my sons toys in here. The only thing that I would say is I don't think it has the best support. There's two pieces to this item, the Cap for the box then the box itself. You pretty much just open the box & it pretty much springs up itself. The line that separates the box inside is quite thin, & moves around. Like if a put my sons pillow on one side, it'll move the wall. So the divider isn't that sturdy either. BUT with the whole box in place With the cap on it, it stands great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece at a great price !
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite purchase of the year. I needed extra storage space for sheets since my linen closet is quite small and only fits my towels. I spotted this gem on Amazon and absolutely love it. It looks like a real leather bench, very sturdy. There is an insert you put inside, which you don't have to use, but I did. It separates my winter and summer sheets. I have 8 sets of queen sheets in this beauty and now my storage problem is over. I'm going to order another one for the guest room. Amazon, you rock !
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Works great, intended to use as a coffee table but ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, intended to use as a coffee table but decided to flip it on its side and add storage cubes for children's toys instead!
customer_reviews.author: live virtual families 2 fan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much. I purchased 2 of them. One goes in my den with all my books inside!!! And I use the top for a seating area. See the pics. Literally I was looking for a better way to store all my books and I lined them all up inside!! Worked nearly and perfectly. I bought the other one to serve as storage and seating at the end of my bed. Perfect for queen size beds.
customer_reviews.author: You won't be sorry!!!

customer_reviews.title: If you think skunks smell great you'll love this
customer_reviews.text: I can't get past the way this REEKS to care much about how well it's designed. The smell is unbelievable!! I have been airing it out for over a week, doused it with febreeze and left cotton balls with essential oils inside. Nothing can overcome the stink. I had to move it out of the bedroom and into the basement. No possible way I could store clothes in this. Will have to find some other use for it. The mfr includes an insert in the pkg stating that the smell is not toxic and will dissipate. Seriously?! It arrived in a badly damaged carton, otherwise I would be driving speedily to Kohls-with the car windows wide open- to return it.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ottoman for storage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ottoman for storage. I am really happy with it. It is pretty strong and looks discrete but nice in my living room. I was skeptical about the quality of this product because it is bent before mounted, but once I put the bottom and top part, it definitely feels strong and you even can sit down on it even if you weigh 250 pounds. I wish I could have more space in my apartment to buy another one. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JTR

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I read very positive comments about this product and I ordered one, very disappointed with the quality of the product, It is like paper tiny don't even try to sit on at, I used to have two of them before and they were very good, this one I am going to send back is not worth the money. Update I ordered this ottoman in October 17 now is December 10 and it all ready demaged, don't waist your money this is really bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, go elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: For the first few days, this worked as expected. I left the top off like I was told to get rid of the smell but nearly a month later, the smell is still here. Also the middle divider does not fit properly into thedivider section and so the ottoman bench does not stand staight and so is barely suitable for sitting let alone storage
customer_reviews.author: TJ B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Literally took me 30 seconds to put together. :) I was skeptical about the quality and stability for it being "foldable" but it's perfect! I can plop down on it and it doesn't even budge. It looks like it should be way more expensive than it actually is, it's beautiful in my living room. We replaced my coffee table with this ottoman since my 8 month old kept trying to bust his head on it. He loves to pull himself up and stand by it. The inside storage compartment is HUGE. It's soft and comfortable for when you want to put your feet up but yet it's nice and sturdy for use as a coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah 👽

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and wears quickly. We can’t really use ...
customer_reviews.text: *** update*** Upon reviewing this item, the seller contacted me and offered a refund without the hassle of having to figure out how to return it. I’m rather impressed with the customer service demonstrated through this process. Good customer service goes a long way these days. Although my original review stands, I’d be willing to try other items from this seller knowing they offer outstanding customer service should any issues arise. Cheaply made and wears quickly. We can’t really use it as extra seating because it isn’t strong enough to hold an adults weight. It works well for extra storage but don’t expect it to last very long with overuse.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA G SOHL

customer_reviews.title: Makes stored fabrics smell horrible
customer_reviews.text: Initial love ruined by terrible smell. We really liked these because of their look. They're not sturdy, but they fit our space and (we thought) needs. Unfortunately the blankets we stored in these for a couple months smelled AWFUL when we went to use them alter. It smells like formaldehyde. Washing the blanks multiple times has not completely removed the smell. Only going to use them for non-fabric items until we run to an IKEA to replace them. We definitely would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C.G WH.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived torn
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to unbox an pop open, and it looks good and functional. Only problem is that it came damaged and the corner was torn. The material is very, very thin around the base of the ottoman so I don't anticipate this to last too long. Customer service did reach out and rectify the issue, though.
customer_reviews.author: misscrusty

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, overall good value
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but is not as sturdy and high quality as some of the reviews suggest. I originally gave it only 3 stars, but when I considered the price and the overall value, I felt I was being unfair. Also, the seller reached out to me to find out more detail about my 3 star review and seemed genuinely concerned. The overall value of this ottoman is good and the service from the seller is excellent, so I'm adjusting my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo D. Gianvito

customer_reviews.title: The item was great when I first got it
customer_reviews.text: The item was great when I first got it, it definitely holds all the board games. The problem is the quality. It damaged in less than a month. We don't open it that often, so for it to damage on the inside like it did so quickly is very disappointing. Maybe I just got a lemon one, but the company was willing to resolve my issue with their product. The company was amazing to work with and I highly recommend this company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Cordova

customer_reviews.title: It means I cannot use this as a storage ottoman because it makes everything stored in it smell like chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get rid of the strong chemical smell. It's been months. I have aired it out outside, left the top off, washed it. It means I cannot use this as a storage ottoman because it makes everything stored in it smell like chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase, thinking about getting another one
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase, thinking about getting another one. I have it in my room and I use it to seat there and it's sturdy and comfy, super easy to assemble. I have my dumbbells, mat and other small exercise equipment. It's roomy and quality is pretty good. You can have a lot of stuff there, for the price/quality it's an wonderful choice.
customer_reviews.author: JuMaRi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: At the price I got this I wasn't too sure how it would hold up as I only store all my dogs stuff in there. The top cover is very well made that you could sit on it but I hesitate on that given the side of this isn't made with the same material. It's very simple to put together, it took me less than 5 minutes to set up. For me it was a perfect size to store dog stuff. You do have to fiddle with the sides to make sure the cover closes properly.. Besides that I think it's pretty decent if you use it for storage only.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Luv Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Them folding walls double as a downside...
customer_reviews.text: This is good for what is it, which is an inexpensive (kinda) ottoman that's a good size, and ships in a small/lightweight package. I'm not sure how much i'd trust the 300 lb rating, but I'm not exactly going to be jumping on an ottoman in the first place. But the walls for the thing are folding which makes me question its strength. I put a comforter inside this and the walls were bulging out too easily for my liking...and it wasn't even "full"
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Way too flimsy and poorly fabricated
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't as sturdy as its made out to be except for the lid. The lid is well made and is thick and strong. However, the actual ottoman storage is bendy thin cardboard that you unfold. Once unfolded you add the base cardboard and a partition cardboard. The material wrapped around the cardboard has too much slack and isn't tight enough so it flares. It looks very cheaply made because of this. I didn't like it in the end. This is only worth it if you pay $20 or less. UPDATE: I have to say, excellent customer service from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gee

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy like other reviews have said
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. It is sturdy like other reviews have said. The divider in the middle is worthless though. It doesn’t stay in place and I was constantly fixing it so I took it out. After just a minute month of using it one of the buttons on the top came loose so it’s not indented like the others. I contacted the company and hopefully they will do something. I will update if I hear back. I just got a replacement for the ottoman. The company is easy to get a hold of and has good communication.
customer_reviews.author: Matezy218

customer_reviews.title: Buying another one
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an ottoman but didn’t want to spend $100+. Came across this and thought, why not! I was a little surprised at first. I told my significant other to be prepared to assemble it but then after opening the box we discovered it basically just pops up and is ready to go. So at first I was SO NERVOUS. I figured since it was a pop up it wouldn’t be sturdy or hold up. To my surprise, it has been great. Looks great, and feels pretty heavy and sturdy. We have sat on it with no issues. I’m actually buying a second one for my daughters room
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Frost

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Functional, easy to assemble, but very cheap looking. Glad I didn’t pay too much for it. Not something to place in a visible area of your house, but hidden away for storage purposes and you can use as extra seating if you have a party which I like. The product image can be deceiving and this isn’t a high quality looking ottoman (hence the price), but a ottoman looking storage box so I advise you set realistic expectations and know what you are getting before you order.
customer_reviews.author: The P-Unit

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Decoration, Storage, and Seating for Any Space
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! It has made organization And storage SO much easier in my "compact" (read: tiny) apartment. It's attractive, it's great storage, and it can support (based on my and family members sitting on it, slowly and with care) one adult plus; so far it has taken a 250lb person sitting on it without any incident. Granted, we've all heeded the instructions and sat carefully, not flopping onto it or suddenly putting weight on it. The measurements and colors are true, and it took all of about 20 seconds to "assemble". I'm only unhappy I didn't buy them sooner!
customer_reviews.author: EllB

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Storage
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive bench that looks decent from a distance and offers a lot of storage. It’s not something you can sit on and it’s a bit on the flimsy side. When you get up close, its inexpensive price starts to show itself. Also, if you have to get in and out of it frequently, this is not great for that because the top needs to be manipulated to get it back into place. My rating would be significantly lower if the price wasn’t so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love it! Love it! So much that I purchased a second Storage Ottoman Bench (and a third one, smaller, from the same company.) Now I am using one as a toy box in the family room and one at the feet of the bed to store extra pillows and blankets. They are super easy to put together, the material (FAUX leather) is very soft, and they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Simo B

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great - Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this right after Christmas for all of my daughters gifts. It was super easy to assemble and it looks GREAT in her room. Her room is now clean again. I would order again. I know some people had issues with the top cracking when they sat on it. My daughter is only 60 some off pounds...so I think she would be good with this. Me personally would not sit on it. Not because I dont think it would hold me but because its not really made for that purpose. I think if you use it as storage and not additional seating it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak, falls apart quickly, looks heartier than it is
customer_reviews.text: Me and my friend both purchased this a few years ago. Mine fell apart in about a year. Wood sticking out through plastic cover. My friend's also fell apart quickly. We're both frustrated. Would absolutely not recommend. Bought another one from TJ Max (Ross had same price too), the same price as this, and feels twice as thick and sturdy at least. Plus regular store ones the lid stays open by itself...better kids toy box than this (what we got it for).
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaZaineb

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for storage space.
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a toy box in our den/family room. It is perfect and stores ALOT. Books, toys, stuffed animals....It adds to the decor and I'm glad to have found this item. I found this to be as durable as expected considering the price and I'm not disappointed with the one or two nicks I've seen. We have not nor did we intend to use this for sitting so I can't offer feedback other than I find my 3 yr old laying and flopping around on it sometimes. I imagine it would hold 2 small kids with no problems. If it's full, maybe an adult or two.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce_imb

customer_reviews.title: Great for families with toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! For a long time we had our shoes all over the floor and my toddler would destroy it. Now, that side of the room looks so neat and clean. My daughter likes to sit and play on and I'm able to wipe away any food trails she makes on it. I wish I would've purchased this sooner. My house doesn't look has torn apart anymore with shoes everywhere lol.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Was quick and easy to
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to hold all my extra sheets and pillows. Was quick and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Molly P

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, this isn't so bad.
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous. I bought two, one in green and one in black. I love the way it looks honestly. The reason I knocked a star off is because the lid doesn't close well and because its made of what seems to be nearly cardboard construction the bowing from the sides are the cause. It will close fine if there isn't much put inside. I bought this for bedding, but honestly I would use it for something else and get something sturdier for bulging fabrics. As I do say thought, its gorgeous and could see it used for many other applications. My little disclaimer, no discounts, no offers, just an honest amazon user helping her fellow shoppers!
customer_reviews.author: Chibi

customer_reviews.title: One of my Favorite finds -Lots of Storage and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I looked for quite some time to find a decent sized toybox. They were all too flimsey or too small. This ottoman was perfect, I could not have found anything better. It was wide enough to hold his longer push toys. It was deep enough and tall enough to hold all the rest. When evening comes and time for toys to be gone and books to come out,I put the lid on, which is too heavy for him to lift. The lid is soft and plenty strong for adults to sit on. The color and design look great in my living room. One of my Favorite finds yet.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand by what it said
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together it was very spacious I was able to put things that I wanted in there but it claims that it holds up to 660 pounds I don’t think so I had this since May 2019 and for the price I paid for this they should last longer. No I did not get any kind of warranty or anything on this I shouldn’t have to if they claim it holds up to 660 pounds in 2 to 3 people I will not ever buy this again this is a waste of my money.Now I have to save up to buy a different kind
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to sit on it.
customer_reviews.text: My headline may perplex you. However what you may not know is that this comes in the mail all folded up. Yeah it's not very strong material in itself, however when you unfold it it brings support to all the right areas. Comfortable enough to put your feet on, lie on, and stable enough to put a glass or a beverage without it tipping over. Also it's strong enough to sit on it. And you can store all your blankets or weed inside it. Also small children. (Relax, its for hide and seek). Add a rug under it and it'll complete your living room. Don't get too attached to it though because in the divorce your wife will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage seat!
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted additional seating in her living room without having an additional couch, so this seemed like a good option. It was super easy to assemble, but I wish it was just a little bit wider to give a deeper area for sitting. Otherwise, it is nice having additional seating with the added benefit of extra storage. The material is nice, and we plan to add a faux fir/pillows to top it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Great storage - and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together. It's a matter of unfolding it and placing in the floor. It took me 2 minutes. Yeah - unfolding it - but don't let that fool you. This item is great for the price. And a great value for the price. It's very sturdy. It's much sturdier than I expected it to be. I sit on it quite a bit and have never felt it give. Honestly, it is so lightweight, I didn't expect much - but I'm impressed. It has quite a bit of storage, too - and it looks great in our living room
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy/Multi use/Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this so that I could have a stool at the bottom of my bed to sit on for easy application of my shoes, but it turned out to be more useful. It actually holds about 10 pairs of shoes and doubles as an aid in assisting my two year old granddaughter to easily get on and off the bed. Also I love the fact that it has a non-noticable crease in the middle for easy opening and closing, as opposed to another one I purchased were you have to remove the entire top, which is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: R ADDISON

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman that holds up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect ottoman bench for storage space but yet sturdy enough to sit on. It's not particularly heavy and I wasn't sure how the weight would be handled but my husband who is 6'4" and weighs over 200lbs sits on it as well and so far no issues. Plus the kids have been on it as well with no problems. Unless something changes I'd say this is a great sitting space for the price. And it looks really nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Poshjap

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a little nook in our hallway. It’s perfect for a quiet reading area and stores all of the extra blankets we have. My husband and I both stood on it to hang LED lights on the ceiling and it held up perfectly. We weigh a combined total of almost 500lbs so it’s not lying when it says it can hold up to 600lbs. It’s extremely sturdy and well built! I just purchased another one for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jen L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it and how much storage it has. I honestly wouldn't sit more than one person on there unless ita little kids. Sitting in the middle would be the best. Its super easy to assemble and to put away of needes. I love that shipment was fast and the box didnt even have much damage. I highly recommend this for anyone who needs storage and sitting of a sort. Great for small homes.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not a bench for heavy people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office so there could be a seat/storage option. It fits most of what I wanted to put in there and was easy to assemble, however; any person who is on the larger side (over 160) I am a little nervous to have them sit on it. I would feel horrible if someone crashed to the ground on my office floor if the bench gave way. This is probably best in a kids room or a home where strangers aren't likely to sit thinking it is more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Vivion

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Super easy to set up - it's like a big folding laundry hamper. Looks very nice, too! One thing to note - there's a divider you insert in the middle, separating the left and right sides. The instructions say the divider is required for stability, so if you are planning to store long skinny things, this may not be the best bet. For misc. decluttering and storage, though, it's great! I don't know yet how it is for sitting on - I will update this review if I get a strong sense one way or another.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: I never really leave post like this but I am extremely impressed for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: I never really leave post like this but I am extremely impressed for the price that I paid for this item it has plenty of storage and it is very sturdy. The best part is that you don't have to break out any tools it all literally just pops up and you put the lid on and it's ready to go and it looks like a heavy piece of furniture but it absolutely is not heavy at all. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus.F Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how easy it was to pop up and assemble. The dark brown color is nice and the length is good for 1-2 people to sit comfortably when putting on their shoes. We fit like 30 pairs of men and women's sneakers/sandals in here. Definitely a cheaper alternative than similar models I've seen and so far (about 6 months in) the quality is holding up! The only warning I have is for folks who have a lot of tall boots - they won't fit unless the boots are short or can compress down. DO NOT sit on it if the top isn't completely aligned and in position, it will damage (or break!) it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Afzal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our front entryway for our mass collection of shoes that always seem to pile up next to the door. We also needed a place to sit and put on/take off our shoes. This ottoman fits the bill! Very happy with this purchase. It's not expensive yet it looks and feels like it should cost more. The set up is incredibly simple, just fold out the sides and put the cover on top and there ya go! Easy peasy. Although the sides are fold up, this is one sturdy ottoman. It won't collapse on you. It is nice to look at, nice to sit on, and it fits all of our shoes. Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: HurstTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: After about a month the lid does not go on as easily as it did in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Cheap! Bought three of these and they all fell apart. After about a month the lid does not go on as easily as it did in the beginning. The corners are all torn. It works if you don't plan on getting inside a lot. My kids put all their stuffed animals inside and from opening the top daily it took a beating. For almost fifty dollars though it should hold up better then it did. Would not purchase again. It is worth about $20 that is all.
customer_reviews.author: JILL

customer_reviews.title: Love them for kids
customer_reviews.text: At first I only had one to hide my sons toys in the family room now I have two to make him a play area with benches so he can read! If you put it on its side like I did it’s not gonna sit in adult very well it might collapse but for young child that should be perfectly fine there’s a thin divider that comes out easily my son los to pull it out don’t depend too much on the divider. If you assemble it the correct way and put the seat on the top I’ve sat on it and I’m 140 pounds without ever worrying about it fall apart! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Good for small blankets/pillows.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I thought but I guess I should have read the dimensions. It's really made for small blankets and pillows. I even put a few board games because I host a lot of game nights. If you do decide to put comforters, you probably can only fit 2 queen size covers and that's it! It definitely have a bad smell like everyone says ..but I sprayed and wiped it down with Fabulous and Downy to get the smell out. It's been working so far, I'll update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ambee

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking and serves it's purpose. Love the extra storage space since I have a small apartment. The top corner of mine was "scrunched" when I got it, but it's starting to work back into form, and I can hardly tells it's there now. Some people have complained of loose buttons that fall off. I haven't had that problem, but after two months I've noticed some of the thread fraying where I prop my foot regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great soft tote
customer_reviews.text: This 15" tall bench seat is similar to the reusable soft grocery boxes with a reinforced wood edged lid. It holds quite a few extra blankets and matches the sofa. I would like to love it but sadly the lid was completely smashed in UPS transit, rendering it inefficient to bear weight. If I could be sure it wouldn't happen again I'd order a second one but at $50 I'm hesitant.
customer_reviews.author: Kate L

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be. Holds my weight so I can tie my shoes and looks great in front of my bed I get compliment on it a lot and I myself think it looks great. You need to be gentle with it don’t jump, plot down on it bearing a lot of weight or shake around because it isn’t super sturdy and I feel it would break. I haven’t used the storage yet so all I can say there is that there’s a lot of Room inside which is good. I honestly feel it’s not worth the price though I would of happily paid $30 for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kris P

customer_reviews.title: Useful but still smells after a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year and a half ago and it's worked pretty well for storing bed linens, but even after all this time it still has the same gross outgassing fake leather stink. I've tried to air it out off and on, emptying it and leaving it open or closed for a week at a time it in the sun, in other rooms, with activated charcoal packets, etc. since I got it and nothing has worked. It's okay, but if you're sensitive to odors give this one a pass.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Caprine

customer_reviews.title: however I noticed that after a while the top didn't feel as sturdy as I thought it should
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench in April 2017 and lived it, however I noticed that after a while the top didn't feel as sturdy as I thought it should. I reached out to the manufacturer to find out where I could get a replacement and they sent me a new top. They were responsive and helpful. Now it's awesome!!!!!! It's sturdy and comfy. My 7 year has fallen asleep on it a few times. I use it to store linens and I'm sure it would be great to store other items.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful product, you will want to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the 43" L Faux Dark Brown bench to use to store my daughter's extra toys in the living room. It popped right up with ease, and is supported rather well. It has become way more than just a storage space. My one year old LOVE this bench. It is her ideal height, and this was a huge catalyst in her first steps. When we get a bigger space, I intend on purchasing one for every room! Very functional, with a stylish design. And the material is very easy to clean and durable. My pets nails have also never caused any damage, despite their attempts. I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Saint Croix Mama

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have to rave about this ottoman! I was skeptical because of the low price, but much to my surprise...... It assembled in minutes, no tools, just pop up the sides, put on the lid. Plenty of storage room. I have 2 blankets and 2 sets of queen sheets, I could actually put another blanket in it. It is nice looking, faux leather looks real. A stylish addition to my bedroom It's sturdy, I sit on it to get dressed. Great Buy! GREAT Price!
customer_reviews.author: Temla Staum

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: Visually it looks great. It is affordable and feels like it. I'm constantly worried that the thing will collapse whenever I sit on it. Update: Songmics contacted me and assured me that the product is rated to hold up to 600 lbs.. That certainly did make me feel a lot more comfortable with the quality. Great customer service. I really like that the company is concerned about the quality of the product and the customer feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jones

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's acceptable
customer_reviews.text: The sides could use some support, because getting the top on can be annoying. If you have some blankets in there, it causes the sides to bulge and the top won't slide on without pushing it in. The dividers don't stay in place because of the bulging and it comes out of the slots. The sides is just cardboard and I feel it will collapse if you sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Megatron Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our 1 year old's toys in the living room... also had up to two adults sit on it for our bible study.... it is much sturdier than I anticipated for being "pop up". It looks really nice too... the middle divider doesn't stay in place, which is slightly annoying... but it still seems quite sturdy so it's not a big issue... we've had it about a month now and its still in good shape despite our toddler's rough play. We like it so much we ordered a second one for our bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: Different than expected but still good
customer_reviews.text: The mixture of reviews had me concerned so I decided to make my own opinion, my biggest concern was if it could really hold my wieght to my surprise it can quite well, that being said it would probably break if I hopped down on it but that tire for most things. I didn’t expect the construction of the furniture but that was more on my for not reading close enough. All of my items fit well it in just as spacious as I needed
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price, not made with children in mind
customer_reviews.text: The color and assembly was good. It would be sturdy enough if you didn't have children. My kids opened it and then didn't put the lid on correctly so it easily broke the corners. So the corners are cheaply made. The company did refund my money and that was nice. They were very good about the return. I just do NOT recommend this item with children.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Henricksen

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how easy this was to assemble. I think maybe all of ten minutes. It looks very nice and does hold a lot more than I thought. The top is well padded and does not look like a cheap product at all. I gave it 4 stars because it has a removable divider for the center and it will not stay in the groove. Nothing serious. I would buy another one if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Runyon

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs! I needed a place to store blankets and pillows in a den with a sofa bed that is sometimes used for overnight guests. It's a little small for my taste, but holds everything I need so I'm completely satisfied. It helps that there is no assembly other then folding out and pushing the bottom in to hold the shape. Don't know how long it will last, with the amount of use my den gets but as I see it.. at this price, even it it lasts a couple years it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price just really bad smelling
customer_reviews.text: The bench is pretty reliable in terms of sturdiness and convenience. Roomy storage and really easy to assemble. However, I noticed after a month of owning the ottoman there was a distinct smell inside the ottoman and makes everything smell like chemical. I’ve aired it out several times and scrubbed the inside to remove the odor. I can’t put anything in the ottoman without it smelling like some kind of chemical. Had it not been for that aspect this ottoman is nice for the price. Just makes everything smell like some awful chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Hector R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Wow, for the price, what a bargain. It's every bit of gorgeous in person as it is in the photos. Good bit of room inside to store. I aired mine out for about a week before using to store and was good to go. Although fairly sturdy, I wouldn't use it as a seat or a stool. I don't think it would hold up so well over time. If you want a sturdier one you can use to sit on, I would recommend paying more for one that is constructed of wood.
customer_reviews.author: L & F

customer_reviews.title: Great storage Ottoman, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my girlfriend to put her feet up when we watch movies. The storage is an added bonus. It shipped fast but got lost by UPS for 4 days and I thought we would never get it. It finally arrived today with no damage so we were pretty happy with that. Other than the shipping issue we are very happy with the quality and sturdiness of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Seller contacted me and made things right. UPDATING my review to 4 Stars I REALLY wanted to like these. I purchased 2 for a corner seating in my living room. They are very cheaply made. Will be OKAY for kids to sit on. Not for ADULTS. They are made withn PLYWOOD or some CHEAP material. When we sit on them, they wobble. Can see these breaking if adults sit on them. VERY DISSAPOINTED. Donating to Goodwill. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworx

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but the smell :(
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is a very pretty storage bin that was supposed to be used for the end of my bed. However, despite my best efforts it has such a horrible smell that I couldn’t keep it. It wipe easily and feels and looks like a quality piece but again, the smell wouldn’t go away. I don’t know if they are all this way but it stunk up my entire room.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra storage and seating
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have purchased because I love the first one so much. I have a comfortable size place but not a whole lot of closet space and also to maximize seating this works to store blankets her linens or anything you want to store in there and doubles as a nice sturdy extra seating. I have one at the foot of my bed and I have one in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... next to me and it dident give out (wouldn't recommend it )but it is defiantly strong enough for most ...
customer_reviews.text: When I was assembling this thought wow this is flimsy but then I finished and sat my large ass on it about 270 and then my friend about 230 sat next to me and it dident give out (wouldn't recommend it )but it is defiantly strong enough for most any one to sit on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by all the positive reviews and I was not disappointed in person! This bench is really great quality, down to the stitching! It's cushy and sturdy and looks fantastic! It's a perfect entryway bench for kids to sit on and put on their shoes. The storage is also a huge plus! I love this and will likely buy another in the future. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming out right out of the box. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: **update: two stars added for customer service. Within days of my review I was issued a full refund for this product due to the ripped stitching. You can order this product with confidence that your expectations will be met, or they will make it right. The first picture is from right out of the box. Some of the stitching was coming out already when I first unpacked it. The second picture is from the second day we had it, already it’s ripped out another stitch. I’m pretty disappointed in this. Other than that it seems okay. Tons of storage inside.
customer_reviews.author: SarahS

customer_reviews.title: Neat looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: I liked the 1st one well enough to buy a 2nd one. It's a good Idea to leave it open outside or near a window for a couple of days to "off gas". It comes with a divider that can be easily removed. I've certainly had over 200 pounds of people sitting on it. I'm able to store stuff in plain site because it looks like an attractive sitting bench of sorts.
customer_reviews.author: Orville T. Hopshacker III

customer_reviews.title: Don't over fill it with toy guns like my child did
customer_reviews.text: Don't over fill it with toy guns like my child did. He had so many from his birthday and from last Christmas, I bought this to use as a toy box, but for a 8 year old, it's kinda hard for him to close it as the top is kinda heavy for him. Other then that, it's very sturdy, he can sit on it, watch those little fingers when trying to put the top back.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Manangan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: # Lots of storage space. You can keep lots of things inside and keep your room clean. Also it takes in lots of weight so adults at least 2 of them can seat together. Its a must have product. The material is awesome. Overall you will love having it whether its bedroom or living room or any other place its a must have product. Just wish they reduce the price a bit to have mass sale. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: IQ

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bin
customer_reviews.text: Great storage bin. Assembly is literally 2 mins. A bit on the cheap side in terms of construction...but I weigh in at 210lbs and I sat on it and it held me securely. I will not make a habit if using it as a seat but a storage bin and a foot rest...I would use it all day! The storage space holds about 2 full sized throw blankets and maybe a pillow or two. I plan on getting another.
customer_reviews.author: HDub

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea where they’re getting those reviews from but this item is a piece of crap I bought two of them they are not worth the money on top of that I had to pay almost $100 to ship them back to the company that cost me nothing to receive them so I actually lost money which is horrible I would not advise anyone to buy this product do not listen to those reviews because they are lying
customer_reviews.author: Indian Trail NC

customer_reviews.title: NOt sturdy but works
customer_reviews.text: Using it for DnD stuff and a seat for my players, it sits 2 comfortably with both of them spreading their legs if they wish. The middle piece doesnt exactly just sit sturdy in there, so I would suggest putting blankets and stuff in there just in case that piece becomes problematic, but I hadn't seen any issue the whole time we've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Meoki

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my kids’ room in our travel trailer. They have been extremely helpful in keeping the children’s stuff from just piling everywhere and they also provide seating in that room. Each one is rated for a 600lb load so 2 kids can sit on one with no problem. The only negative, is that when they first arrived, the chemical smell was overpowering. We set them outside for a day and it calmed down. I was worried that the clothes we put in it would smell that way, but they have’t. We’ve had them for several months now and they have held up quite well. They still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: azaeliahardbotle

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: This isn't furniture, but it is a great storage option that I hope will work as occasional seating in a children's room. Middle support is flimsy and doesn't stay in place well, so the top must be on to keep the ottoman rigid. Fabric was not applied quite straight, so you can see rippling in front if you look closely. If you need something that will take hard wear, or be moved often when full, I think you'll need something pricier, but if you are wanting to hide storage, this seems like a good value.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Not a help for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Might be a solution for some people, but it's rather low, narrow and does in no way look like leather. Bought this as a help our dog get up into bed, but it was way to low to make any difference. If you have anything in the room in real brown leather, it will be very obvious that this is not. Returned. Please be aware that there is no free shipping back, should you return, a fact I did not know.
customer_reviews.author: DaneinOregon

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Ok seriously, I had no idea how much I would like this. It really is nice, I unboxed it and was expecting to build a typical low quality made in C..... piece. Yes, it is made overseas. But it build in seconds with no tools! and its quality is very nice. At first I couldn't see how it would hold up, but then the second its built and the divider is in the ottoman all made sense. Holds 300+ pounds with ease. I will be buying 2 or 3 more for around the house! My kids thinks it fun to show everyone that the top comes off! Looks very nice, good stitch lines too. A great find!
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: IT'S GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect thing to store extra blankets as well as being the 'resting place' for the bedspread at night. It's also a great place to sit to put shoes and socks on. AND it looks very pretty in our bedroom as it is very well made. A resounding YES!
customer_reviews.author: margieb

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price: ridiculously easy to assemble, looks and feels way more expensive than it is, surprisingly sturdy - I'm 6 feet tall 185lbs, and when I sit on it it feels solid...no give at all. The storage component is great as well, we use it to store extra pillows and blankets for guests but it could also serve as a guest set of drawers (very roomy). I think it'd be difficult to find a ottoman that offers a comparable 'bang-for-your-buck'.
customer_reviews.author: Alastair Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Big and durable
customer_reviews.text: These are so nicely made I bought another and I’ll buy another next week. This fits across the bottom of my full size bed and is sturdy . I store four comforters in it
customer_reviews.author: Heidi shipley

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday, it is actually much sturdier than I expected. I love the eggshell/ cream white and it looks really nice at the end of my bed. Will be using the storage space which is a nice feature and it is also another spot for my cat to hangout in my room :) Overall I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, a great storage solution
customer_reviews.text: This storage bench/ottoman is exactly what we needed. Our older cat needed something to get on the bed and this works great. It is also a nice storage bench. The design is rather ingenious, folds up for easy setup or storage and is quite strong and sturdy. I probably wouldn't jump on it or use it to stand on but it is plenty strong to sit on. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Small standing. Flimsy sides and unstable insert. I was able to sit on it and it felt okay. The top is the best part. Its nicely put together and feels like something decent. Worth $50.00? Eh. Not too sure about that. The bottom part is very cheap laundry basket feel. Just some thin walls and cheap fabric. Might be good for a college student.
customer_reviews.author: William Joseph Smith III

product_meta.title: SONGMICS 43 Inches Folding Storage Ottoman Bench, Storage Chest Footrest Padded Seat, Faux Leather, Black ULSF701
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThis SONGMICS storage ottoman is finely crafted with superior faux leather & quality MDF, the after-set-up construction is sturdy & solid, decorative appearance matches your interior decor & furniture. 

It may work as 

Storage Chest/Trunk 
Sundries finally has somewhere to go, no matter blankets, cushions, clothes, or remotes, books... an easy solution to organize your working and living environment. 

Bed End Bench 
43" Length enables this storage ottoman to be placed at the foot of a queen sized bed. 

Entryway Shoe Bench 
Nice option for entryway organizer, it serves as both shoe storage & shoe bench. 

Puppy step 
Puppies may use it to step onto your bed or watch out of the window. 

Coffee Table 
With ottoman tray, it becomes an ottoman coffee table to place drinks or foods. 

Multiple Choices 
We have a variety of folding storage ottomans in size and color, simply search SONGMICS storage ottoman to find more. 

Product Specification: 
- Color: Black 
- Upholstery Material: Faux Leather 
- Seater Filling Material: Sofa Sponge 
- Construction Material: CARB P2 Medium Density Fiber Board 
- Bottom Material: Oxford Fabric 
- Product Dimension: 43"L x 15"W x 15"H (110 x 38 x 38cm) 
- Shipping Weight: 21lbs 

Package Contents: 
- 1 x Folding Storage Ottoman

Note:
- Side boards are fixed with staples. Please check and be careful with it if any board looses or sways.
feature_bullets: HIDDEN STORAGE SPACE: Extra large volume of 120 liters is sufficient to meet various needs; place it in your bedroom, living room, hallway or utility room to organize books, clothes, blankets, shoes, toys and many other sundries

STURDY & COMFY FOR SITTING: Constructed by CARB P2 MDF, this ottoman bench holds up to 660lbs (static load capacity), easily seats 2-3 adults; highly resilient foam padding ensures a comfortable sitting experience

CLASSIC DECORATIVE APPEARANCE: Covered with premium faux leather, this storage chest is super easy to wipe clean with damp cloth; button-tufted bench top with double stitching lines brings style to your room

SUPER EASY TO SET UP & FOLD FLAT: Collapsible design makes it easy for you to set up a cozy padded bench within seconds; can be easily folded flat when not in use, storage takes little space; perfect for dorms and RVs
EXCELLENT FOR SMALL SPACES: Multi-purpose ottoman works great as shoe bench, footstool, window bench, bed stool, toy chest, coffee table, puppy step, etc; sized 43"L x 15"W x 15"H (110 x 38 x 38cm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,725 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
